name: Building Cars Wizard
description:
Build new cars with your LEGO bricks and have fun with it.

You can build dozen different cars such as racing, police, trucks and the like.

Easy to follow step-by-step instruction for every item. Each of them will give you a full set of bricks you are need.

Share your creations with other people in the Gallery section. You also will love to see what the other people build with LEGO.
